title._content: Roosevelt in Piraju, Minas, Brazil, arriving at Dr. Leonel's  (LOC)

description._content: Bain News Service,, publisher. Roosevelt in Piraju, Minas, Brazil, arriving at Dr. Leonel's [1913] 1 negative : glass ; 5 x 7 in. or smaller. Notes: Title from data provided by the Bain News Service on the negative. Photo shows President Theodore Roosevelt (1858-1919) in Brazil during the Roosevelt-Rondon Scientific Expedition to the Amazon River which began in 1913. (Source: Flickr Commons project, 2010) Forms part of: George Grantham Bain Collection (Library of Congress). Subjects: Brazil Format: Glass negatives. Rights Info: No known restrictions on publication. Repository: Library of Congress, Prints and Photographs Division, Washington, D.C. 20540 USA, hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.print General information about the Bain Collection is available at hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.ggbain Higher resolution image is available (Persistent URL): hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/ggbain.15327 Call Number: LC-B2- 2975-3
